meanings.definition: A person who lights or tends to street lamps.
meanings.sent1: The lamplighters walked through the city at dusk, lighting up the street lamps.
meanings.sent2: The lamplighters were out early every evening to ensure the street lamps were lit.
meanings.sent3: The lamplighters had a friendly competition to see who could light the most lamps in an hour.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the lamplighters emerged like fireflies, bringing light to the darkening streets.
meanings.sent5: The lamplighters' job was crucial in keeping the city safe and well-lit.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals responsible for maintaining and operating street lamps.
meanings.sent1: The city council hired a team of lamplighters to ensure the street lamps were always in working order.
meanings.sent2: The lamplighters gathered every morning to discuss any issues with the street lamps.
meanings.sent3: The lamplighters organized a picnic under the glow of the street lamps they maintained.
meanings.sent4: The lamplighters worked together like a well-oiled machine to keep the city illuminated.
meanings.sent5: The lamplighters' dedication to their work was evident in the bright and welcoming streets.
